snippet: Reports suggested that the explosions were the result of an Israeli missile strike that had been carried out in coordination with Egypt.
abstract: Up to five suspected Islamic militants are killed in two explosions in restive Sinai Peninsula close to Egypt's border with Israel; Egyptian military has intensified its campaign against Islamic militants operating against Egyptian forces in region.

byline.original: By BEN HUBBARD and ISABEL KERSHNER
byline.contributor: Ben Hubbard reported from Cairo, and Isabel Kershner from Jerusalem.

lead_paragraph: Reports suggested that the explosions were the result of an Israeli missile strike that had been carried out in coordination with Egypt.

headline.main: Sinai Blasts Kill Up to 5 Thought to Be Militants
headline.print_headline: Sinai Blasts Kill Up to 5 Thought to Be Militants
